Introduction
This topic contains information on determining SC for congenital, developmental, or hereditary disorders, including
definition of
congenital or developmental defects
, and
congenital, developmental, or hereditary disease
establishing SC for congenital, developmental, or hereditary disorders
requesting medical opinions in claims for SC for congenital, developmental, or hereditary disorders
considering the
development of symptoms of hereditary disease in service
, and
aggravation of a hereditary disease in service
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E - Service Connection (SC) for Congenital, Developmental, or Hereditary Disorders
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E
